That's a great approach! Grouping similar items together and creating a visual connection between them can help create a cohesive and visually appealing display. By starting with the vintage Transformers action figure next to the Star Wars action figures, you can create a nostalgic and retro-themed section that celebrates your love for classic sci-fi and action figures.

Remember to pay attention to the visual flow and balance of the display as you add more items. You can always adjust the arrangement to create a sense of harmony and make sure each item gets the attention it deserves.

Adding the rare book about ancient civilizations can be a great way to add depth and variety to the display, but make sure it doesn't overwhelm the other items. You might consider placing it on a separate shelf or in a nearby display case to create a sense of separation and importance.

Most importantly, have fun with it and enjoy the process of curating your display! It's a reflection of your personality and passions, and it's okay to experiment and try out different arrangements until you find one that feels just right.

If you have any more questions or need further guidance, feel free to ask. Otherwise, I hope you'll share a photo of your display once it's complete. I'd love to see how it turns out!
